message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you $2000 and take $8000. You can do better, but this is a good starting point.
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, considering the inflation. You'll still get a good amount, and I'll have a bigger share to start with.
I'll give you $4000, but I'm not going for a 50/50 split. I think I deserve a bit more considering the inflation.
